name: Trubbel’s Utilities
description:
↓ Lots of features ↓

**Chat:**

– Clickable Steam Inspect Links

– Custom Commands (accountage, followage, localmod/sub etc.)

– BTTV-like Moderation

– Channel Name in Popout Chat

– Clickable Usernames in /mods, /vips and Raid Messages

**Directory:**

– Display Channel Follow Dates

– Display Total Followed Channels

– Live Thumbnail Previews

**Inventory:**

– Auto Claim Drops

– Collapsible Drops

**Livestream:**

– Auto Mute/Pause Stream (in background tabs)

**Mod View:**

– Activity Feed Moderation

– Auto Mod View

**Overall:**

– Live Sidebar Previews

– Yet Another Prime Reminder

**Player:**

– Auto Reset Player

**VODs:**

– Auto Skip Muted Segments

– Custom Seeking

– Custom Progress Bar

…among other things…
author: Trubbel
